Episodes.Title: Redemption
Episodes.Writer: Bruno Heller, Ken Woodruff, Erika Green Swafford
Episodes.Actors: Simon Baker, Robin Tunney, Tim Kang
Episodes.Plot: While the unit tackles a murder case involving a woman who stole a million dollars from her employer, Patrick finds out that they have been removed from the Red John case.

Episodes.Title: The Scarlet Letter
Episodes.Writer: Bruno Heller, Tom Szentgyorgyi, Ken Woodruff
Episodes.Actors: Simon Baker, Robin Tunney, Tim Kang
Episodes.Plot: While CBI investigates the murder of a California State Senator's aide, Patrick works on his own under the assumption that the victim was killed by her lover.

Episodes.Title: Red Badge
Episodes.Writer: Bruno Heller, Ashley Gable, Ken Woodruff
Episodes.Actors: Simon Baker, Robin Tunney, Tim Kang
Episodes.Plot: A pedophile who Agent Lisbon caught and sent to prison is shot and killed. The evidence points to Lisbon herself and she has no alibi.

Episodes.Title: Red Menace
Episodes.Writer: Bruno Heller, Leonard Dick, Ken Woodruff
Episodes.Actors: Simon Baker, Robin Tunney, Tim Kang
Episodes.Plot: The team investigates a dangerous biker gang in order to gather information about the death of the attorney who represented the gang.

Episodes.Title: Red Scare
Episodes.Writer: Bruno Heller, Ken Woodruff, Erika Green Swafford
Episodes.Actors: Simon Baker, Robin Tunney, Tim Kang
Episodes.Plot: An architect is killed in the old mansion he recently bought, and the investigation reveals rumors of a haunted house and hidden treasure, as well as the angry descendants of the original owner.

Episodes.Title: Black Gold and Red Blood
Episodes.Writer: Bruno Heller, Ken Woodruff, Erika Green Swafford
Episodes.Actors: Simon Baker, Robin Tunney, Tim Kang
Episodes.Plot: While CBI investigates a homicide over what appears to be over a land claim, Patrick is put in jail for spying on Sam Bosco to get information on Red John.

Episodes.Title: Red Bulls
Episodes.Writer: Bruno Heller, Tom Szentgyorgyi, Ken Woodruff
Episodes.Actors: Simon Baker, Robin Tunney, Tim Kang
Episodes.Plot: Patrick and the rest of the CBI team is forced to work together with Patrick's nemesis in the office, Sam Bosco, in order to find a kidnapping victim.

Episodes.Title: His Red Right Hand
Episodes.Writer: Bruno Heller, Ashley Gable, Ken Woodruff
Episodes.Actors: Simon Baker, Robin Tunney, Tim Kang
Episodes.Plot: Red John strikes again, this time in the CBI office, leaving three agents dead and Sam Bosco in critical condition.

Episodes.Title: A Price Above Rubies
Episodes.Writer: Bruno Heller, Eoghan Mahony, Ken Woodruff
Episodes.Actors: Simon Baker, Robin Tunney, Tim Kang
Episodes.Plot: The new husband of a jewelry store owner is critically injured accidentally walking in on a jewel heist. CBI soon suspects that the heist was pulled off with help from the inside--specifically one of the owner's two nephews.

Episodes.Title: Throwing Fire
Episodes.Writer: Bruno Heller, John Mankiewicz, Ken Woodruff
Episodes.Actors: Simon Baker, Robin Tunney, Tim Kang
Episodes.Plot: The founder of a prestigious Baseball Academy is murdered. After Jane is hit in the head by a baseball as the investigation begins, he dwells on his father and his teenage years as a carnival psychic.

Episodes.Title: Rose-Colored Glasses
Episodes.Writer: Bruno Heller, Leonard Dick, Ken Woodruff
Episodes.Actors: Simon Baker, Robin Tunney, Tim Kang
Episodes.Plot: A former high school student and his wife are killed before his high school reunion, and Jane is forced to get Rigsby's help to perform an elaborate ruse to find the killer.

Episodes.Title: Bleeding Heart
Episodes.Writer: Bruno Heller, Erika Green Swafford, Ken Woodruff
Episodes.Actors: Simon Baker, Robin Tunney, Tim Kang
Episodes.Plot: While investigating the death of a mayor's media liaison, Patrick is kidnapped by an eco-terrorist who is a suspect in the case. Meanwhile, the team reluctantly agrees to be filmed for a documentary.

Episodes.Title: Redline
Episodes.Writer: Bruno Heller, Jordan Harper, Ken Woodruff
Episodes.Actors: Simon Baker, Robin Tunney, Tim Kang
Episodes.Plot: Patrick Jane and the CBI team investigate when the body of a high-end luxury car sales woman is found in the trunk of a Bentley in the dealership's showroom.

Episodes.Title: Blood in, Blood Out
Episodes.Writer: Bruno Heller, Ken Woodruff, Erika Green Swafford
Episodes.Actors: Simon Baker, Robin Tunney, Tim Kang
Episodes.Plot: When a member of Cho's former gang, the Avon Park Playboys, is found murdered, Patrick Jane insists on helping Cho with his off-the-books investigation.

Episodes.Title: Red Herring
Episodes.Writer: Bruno Heller, David Appelbaum, Ken Woodruff
Episodes.Actors: Simon Baker, Robin Tunney, Tim Kang
Episodes.Plot: A chef is poisoned to death during a competition, and CBI is forced to find his killer among his competitors, his estranged wife, and his ambitious assistant.

Episodes.Title: Code Red
Episodes.Writer: Bruno Heller, Ken Woodruff, Erika Green Swafford
Episodes.Actors: Simon Baker, Robin Tunney, Tim Kang
Episodes.Plot: The leak of a dangerous virus at a bio-research facility results in the death of a scientist, and Lisbon and Jane clash with a Disease Control official when they decide to treat the death as a homicide.

Episodes.Title: The Red Box
Episodes.Writer: Bruno Heller, John Mankiewicz, Ken Woodruff
Episodes.Actors: Simon Baker, Robin Tunney, Tim Kang
Episodes.Plot: The team investigates the murder of an British private tutor who may not be what he seemed.

Episodes.Title: Aingavite Baa
Episodes.Writer: Bruno Heller, Tom Szentgyorgyi, Erika Green Swafford
Episodes.Actors: Simon Baker, Robin Tunney, Tim Kang
Episodes.Plot: Patrick is forced to turn to a woman with amnesia to help solve a murder case on an Indian reservation, while special agent Hightower delivers an ultimatum to Rigsby and Van Pelt about their personal relationship.

Episodes.Title: Blood Money
Episodes.Writer: Bruno Heller, Ashley Gable, Jordan Harper
Episodes.Actors: Simon Baker, Robin Tunney, Tim Kang
Episodes.Plot: Patrick's reckless behavior catches up with him when his actions get a case against a hitman thrown out of court and Lisbon on suspension. But when the hitman is shot and killed, he has a shot at redemption.

Episodes.Title: Red All Over
Episodes.Writer: Bruno Heller, Carolyn Ingber, Ken Woodruff
Episodes.Actors: Simon Baker, Robin Tunney, Tim Kang
Episodes.Plot: Patrick finds a new adversary in a charismatic but manipulative cult leader while the CBI team investigates the death of the CEO of a media conglomerate.

Episodes.Writer: Bruno Heller, Leonard Dick, Ken Woodruff
Episodes.Actors: Simon Baker, Robin Tunney, Tim Kang
Episodes.Plot: A brilliant mathematician is shot and killed by a clown, and the team discovers that he was working on a priceless code-breaking device.

Episodes.Title: Red Letter
Episodes.Writer: Bruno Heller, Eoghan Mahony, Ken Woodruff
Episodes.Actors: Simon Baker, Robin Tunney, Tim Kang
Episodes.Plot: A man is murdered right before he is to deliver an important speech about human trafficking at a conference. Psychic Kristina Frye is brought in to help CBI solve the case, even though Patrick remains skeptical about her "gift."

Episodes.Title: Red Sky in the Morning
Episodes.Writer: Bruno Heller, Ken Woodruff, Erika Green Swafford
Episodes.Actors: Simon Baker, Robin Tunney, Tim Kang
Episodes.Plot: The tension between Patrick and Kristina escalates when a Red John impostor strikes and Kristina offers her services to the CBI. However, the case causes the real Red John to come back and meet Patrick for the first time face-to-f...
